Every year, my university programme holds a smaller job fair strictly for students within the programme. This is done partially to network with different organizations, celebrate the past year, and to send off the 4:th grade students. For the 2019 event, I was in charge of the PR-department, which mainly involved creating graphics for the event and re-designing the event page for the theme of the year.

A project me and four other students worked on together with THNX Innovation for the course 'Design-Build-Test' at Umeå University. The specification of the project was decided together with the team at THNX; build an Android application that is capable of directing a AR-figure to real world points of interests. The application was meant to be a spring-board prototype for a currently existing application that was developed in-house by THNX Innovation called 'TiHi på Skattjakt'.

A simple Dice Game to learn the foundations of Android Development that I did for the course 'Development of Mobile Applications' at Umeå University. The game is a slightly different version of 'Yahtzee' where the goal of the game is to get as many points as possible by matching the value of six dice to the value of a score-spinner.
